name: Illuminate Education
tag_list: assessment, curriculum, student, data, instruction, education, school
overview:
Illuminate Education provides student information, assessment, instructional resource, and data management to schools and districts.

Our products, Illuminate Student Information System (ISI), Illuminate Special Education (ISE), Illuminate Data and Assessment (DnA) Management, and Activate Instruction (AI) work seamlessly with other systems or as a complete all-in-one solution.

ISI provides all district and school site staff with a single, web-based point of access to student demographics, attendance, scheduling, discipline, grades, assessment history, state reporting mandates, standards-based report card and gradebook, parent portal, student portal, reporting, and more. ISE is an end-to-end system that includes all aspects of special education and IEP data management, from referral to evaluation to initiation of services.

Illuminate DnA features tools for assessment building, administration (via online, scanning, clicker or hand-entry) and management, data analysis and reporting, and curriculum resource integration.

AI is an integrated, open-ended system that allows teachers to utilize data from student information and assessment systems to match students with personalized resources. Resources are searchable by standards or may be added/uploaded to be shared with students/parents/other teachers.
